content.raw:
There are some test failures on OSX which I don't think have been around for a long time (i.e. not the rendering sensors), but they're already on [default](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/81/console):

~~~
27: [ RUN      ] MagnetometerSensorTest.CreateMagnetometer
27: [Err] [SensorFactory.hh:131] SDF sensor type does not match template type
27: /Users/jenkins/workspace/ignition_sensors-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/ign-sensors/test/integration/magnetometer_plugin.cc:145: Failure
27: Value of: sensor != nullptr
27:   Actual: false
27: Expected: true
~~~

Just bringing it up in case someone has an idea on what caused the regression. I haven't looked further.
